title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos and Q3 2018 has the lowest Price in thousand Mexican pesos.
The difference of Price in thousand Mexican pesos between the highest and lowest Quarter is 270.26.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Price in thousand Mexican pesos 1071.24 is found at Quarter Q1 2019 and the minimum is found at Q3 2018 where Price in thousand Mexican pesos is 800.98.
